item.title: History Of Lattice Based Cryptography
item.description: Historical talk on lattice-based cryptography Daniele Micciancio, UC San Diego https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4KVJbEOqB_Q&list=PLgO7JBj821uGZTXEXBLckChu70kl7Celh&index=22 https://twitter.com/kanzure/status/772649346454040577 Lattice cryptography - from computational complexity to fully homomorphic encryption Introduction 1 So this first of all thanks for coming back from lunch, it’s always an achievement. I want to say that this is a special talk within the workshop here at Simons we have a historical cryptopapers seminars series. We try to revisit historical papers and see what led to them and how they impacted things later.
